definition: to suspend/to hang up/to hang a person
a string of 100 cash (arch.)/to lament/to condole with/variant of 吊[diao4]

sentences.english: Pendants are also favorites because they're both functional and decorative.
sentences.chinese: 我也很喜欢坠饰吊灯，因为它们既实用又好看。

sentences.english: Bones hung from the ceiling like a macabre chandelier.
sentences.chinese: 吊在天花板上的骨头就像是一个阴森的枝形吊灯。

sentences.english: The ceiling light is now covered with a white globe.
sentences.chinese: 现在那盏吊灯上装了一个球形灯罩。

sentences.english: The beautiful chandelier depends from the ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 那盏漂亮的技形吊灯在天花板上。

sentences.english: Impressive 2-sty entry hall with Juliet balconies, dramatic staircase and chandelier set the contemporary tone.
sentences.chinese: 令人印象深刻的2层入口大厅与阳台，楼梯和吊灯。

sentences.english: In the middle of the centerpiece mosaic hangs a chandelier encased in a blue glass cube.
sentences.chinese: 顶面马赛克图腾的中心挂着罩着蓝色玻璃的枝形吊灯。

sentences.english: This chandelier was designed and made in Austria.
sentences.chinese: 这盏大吊灯从设计到制造都是在澳大利亚完成的。

sentences.english: I love crystal chandeliers and use them as often as I can.
sentences.chinese: 我钟情于水晶吊灯，所以尽可能多的使用它。

sentences.english: a huge and unusual crystal chandelier will immediately catch your eye.
sentences.chinese: 一个与众不同的巨型水晶吊灯立马就映入你的眼帘。

sentences.english: The magnificent beau is dancing to the light of chandeliers.
sentences.chinese: 这个衣着华丽的花花公子在枝形吊灯灯光下翩翩起舞。

sentences.english: I am going to get a special pendent lamp.
sentences.chinese: 我正打算去买一种特别的吊灯。

sentences.english: we had the noguchi lantern installed when we moved in.
sentences.chinese: 搬进来后，我们装了一盏noguchi吊灯。

sentences.english: In the centre of the room, under the chandelier, stood the head of the family, old Jolyon.
sentences.chinese: 在房间的当中，枝形吊灯下面，站着老家长乔戎。

sentences.english: I don't want to dangle from a chandelier.
sentences.chinese: 我不想吊在一棵枝形吊灯上。

sentences.english: the huge glass chandelier fell from the roof,injuring a woman.
sentences.chinese: 巨大的玻璃吊灯从房顶掉落，砸伤了一位女士。

definition: cover of lamp/lampshade/glass cover of oil lamp
dome light (of a taxi etc)/ceiling light (in a room)/interior light (of a car)/light on the top of a mast etc
drawing room (room for arriving guests)/living room/CL:間|间[jian1]
cupboard/cupboard that can also be used as a table/sideboard
